name: Permit To Kill
description:
The government announces a new law which allows people to apply for a legal permit to kill a person, the other person will be notified about it.

Jack’s girlfriend Catherine receives a notification that her ex filed to kill her.
What happens next unfolds during gameplay.

*Illusion of Choice

*Consequences of Actions

*Hero’s Journey

*Multiple Endings

Enjoy the story!

#textadventure #pointnclick #crime #novel #steampunk #scifi
